name: Devil's Dungeon
description:
Story

In this game, you play as the infamous Devil Lord, he uses all of his power to create dungeons and monsters to assist in conquering the world, but weakens himself to the point of only being able to give advice, forcing the monsters to protect him from invading heroes while he restores it.
Heroes and summoned girls are coming, can you beat them?

Game Play

In this game, you need to dig and create a dungeon, and populate it with monsters to defend the Devil Lord from heroes while he prepares to conquer the world. The heroes and girls will enter the Devil Lord's dungeon to find and destroy him.

You are given some time to dig out the dungeon and create monsters before heroes come. When the hero is about to enter the dungeon, you must take Devil Lord and change his location, preferably making it harder for the hero to find him. When the hero gets into the dungeon, he will navigate the dungeon until he finds and destroy the Devil Lord. When the Devil Lord died is game over. The hero will fight against any monster that gets in his way. The objective of the games is use monsters to kill all the heroes that invade the dungeon.

You can only dig bricks near the road, expand maze and destroy heroes. Digging cracks brick will create monsters, monster will attack the heroes. Digging silver flash bricks will create experience points, which can be used to improve the level of monsters and girls. Digging gold flash bricks will create coins, which can be spent to improve monsters and dungeon.
When a stage is cleared, you will get coin. The coin is used to upgrade dungeon and monsters. At the same time, you will capture the girl as your slave. You can summon them in battle. Monsters can sometimes get tired in battle. If you find them lazy, please click them to fight.

Game Features

Fun and creative gameplay
More than 120 heroes challenge you
Upgrade your monsters army and dungeon
9 unique girls to experience (dynamic)
Capture the girls and serve you
Lovely dynamic graphics
Adjustable game difficulty
Nostalgia remastered
